textBox.richText: I’m getting a few e-mails about absence. I’d like to remind everyone that: students have the obligation to attend the lecture; students have the right to miss 2 lessons for the 45-hour course, 3 lessons for the 60-hour course; if you are ill or have to go away because of the study-related business, with the presentation of the proof, your absence will be excused; other reasons do not constitute the reason for your absence; even with excuse, the number of your absence must not exceed 10. When you are absent because of your work or some urgent personal matter, I said I will consider the circumstance of your absence, BUT it will be still counted as “absence.” Please remember the item 1) above.
